Name: Lychee & Rose Petal Martini
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of float edible rose petal.
Review: Light pink in colour and subtle in flavour.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by the legendary bartender Dick Bradsell for Opium in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Lychee & Rose Petal Martini contains 151 calories
